quotes.quote: Alcohol is a misunderstood vitamin.
Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
Liquor is not a necessity. It is a means of momentarily sidestepping necessity.
In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
Drinking after work is fine, but if you really want to enjoy working then drink before work.
Candy is dandy, but liquor is quicker.
Because alcohol is encouraged by our culture, we get the idea that it isn't dangerous. However, alcohol is the most potent and most toxic of the legal psychoactive drugs.
Rum is tonic that clarifies the vision, and sets things in true perspective.
Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
Liquor is the kiss of the angels as well as the curse of the devil. It can conceal but also can reveal.
Drinking Rum before 10am makes you a Pirate, not an Alcoholic.
There's naught, no doubt, so much the spirit calms as rum and true religion.
Alcoholism is a well documented pathological reaction to unresolved grief.
There are only two real ways to get ahead today - sell liquor or drink it.
Liquor is one way out an' death's the other.
Rum, n. Generically, fiery liquors that produce madness in total abstainers.
Rum is a flatterer, making fools and lunatics.
Here's to alcohol, the cause of, and solution to, all life's problems.
First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
As an alcoholic, you will violate your standards quicker than you can lower them.
Alcohol, taken in sufficient quantities, may produce all the effects of drunkenness.
It was a maddening image and the only way to whip it was to hang on until dusk and banish the ghosts with rum.
Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
Liquor - you can make it illegal but you can't make it unpopular.
A glass of beer shortens your life by one minute, a glass of wine by two minutes, and a day of work by seven to ten hours.
Herb is the healing of a nation, alcohol is the destruction.
Prohibition is better than no liquor at all.
Best ideas come while sipping rum.
Its liquor is like the sweetest dew from Heaven.
Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
